website_summaries.verdict: Choose this Versace perfume if you don't want a strong scent – it offers a variety of notes that come together nicely, but others on our list linger longer.
pros: Offers a scent that can be described as fresh and earthy with a nice balance of citrus, sweetness, and spice
Garners praise for being a "light" scent that is ideal for spring and summer
cons: Some consumers gripe that the scent doesn't linger as long as they would like
If you prefer a bolder perfume, you may not like it

customer_reviews.title: If you like the fragrances by Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean smelling perfume, that I would also describe as sexy. If you like the fragrances by Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue than this maybe a fragrance you may like also. It's a light fragrance that is not over powering. I would defiantly say this is a fragrance that could be used for a date night, and I would also say it may not appeal to teenagers but not as mature as say something like Chanel #5.
customer_reviews.author: By His Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Why do these lovely fragrances get discontinued???
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance. I buy 2 bottles at a time and will be very sad when I can no longer find it. :( It's been discontinued, so it's like my personal sexy fragrance that most don't have access to or even know of. I always get smiles and you smell good remarks from people I stand in line with. My fiance' will nuzzle his nose all around my neck to smell it and always comments on how delicious I smell. I have a girlfriend who always wants to use it when she's at my house. I just recently gave her a bottle and she thanked me profusely. It is a beautiful, light fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Happy medium! Solid 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows this is definitely a product that you KNOW you have to pay a pretty penny for, for the real quality and scent. With that being said, this rebottled Versace is not bad. YES, it smells of alcohol when you first spray it, however, the scent isn’t compromised too bad and does seem to last a few hours. I still get followed and stalked to know what scent I’m wearing. So if you’re a snob like me, you’ll pay the price but if you’re looking to smell REAL good on a budget, this is it baby! It’s a solid 3 out of 5. A nice happy medium to appease both the snob and the penny pincher inside.
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Different but still great
customer_reviews.text: It does smell different, but it still great, not as strong but 1/4th the price of the long lasting one, and I still smell it for several hours ( not all day) I love it so much, and appreciate the price
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent but smells different in the larger sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought the mini set with perfume and lotion to try it out. Loved it - smelled wonderful - and light. Ordered the larger size lotion and perfume and they definitely do not smell the same. They both smell more like bug repellent. Not sure if it's because they were sitting on a shelf for too long somewhere but I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WestViewPark234

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL smelling perfume if you love sandalwood. It has a very citrusy and light foral forward note when first sprayed, but when it dries down, you're left with a beautiful sandalwood fragrance with hints of the aforementioned notes. I LOOOOOOVE this scent! I get compliments on it all the time. I spray it lightly on my scarves and they smell delicious for a long time. I don't spray this directly on my skin because I'm paranoid about chemical absorption and I haven't been able to replicate using essential oils...I'm working on it though.
customer_reviews.author: EJMessenger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I remembered
customer_reviews.text: I wore this perfume about 10 years ago and stopped when I couldn't find it in stores anymore. I ordered it because I missed it, and it smells exactly like I remember it. Floral, clean and not overpowering. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cory J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Spring/Summer scent 😍
customer_reviews.text: You’ll love this scent like I do if you enjoy notes of Bergamot, Green mandarin, Fig, Sea lily, Cardamom, Jasmine, Cedar, Sandalwood, Olive wood, Musk. Yum! Don’t forget to hit the helpful button 😉
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I origianlly received a sample from scent bird in my monthly subscription and immediately loved it so I was on the hunt for a full bottle. Its light, and fresh perfect for spring/summer. I do wish it was a tad stronger, but maybe that's b/c I only do one spritz b/c I dont want to waist it. I could definatly see this as unisex b/c every time I wear it he asks why I smell like a dude, or wait! Is this for men..lol :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and versatile scent for the warmer months. Day or evening. Work or casual. Perfect gift for your girlfriend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Only citrus smells go great with my body chem

Then I had to step in like ummm that's my new perfume lol. I get compliments all the time and he hardly compliments me on my perfumes unless I ask lol

customer_reviews.title: My favorite summer scent--fresh and citrousy

product_meta.title: Versace Versense By Gianni Versace For Women Edt Spray 3.4 Oz
product_meta.description: Size:3.4 OunceVersace Versense Perfume by Versace, Versace Versense is a unique and exciting perfume for women, released in 2009 . The blend is comprised of natural components that are meant to evoke the Mediterranean with each spray. The fragrance opens with notes of tangy green mandarin, lemony bergamot and the aromatic warmth of fig zest. The perfume’s middle notes include sea lily, floral jasmine petals and peppery cardamom. Rounding out the scent are the woody and earthy notes of cedar wood, olive wood, sandalwood and musk. Long-standing and beloved haute couture and lifestyle brand Versace is the maker of this scent along with 56 others in its fragrance line, the first of which was launched in 1981. The fragrance itself is pale green, perhaps to bring to mind the verdant essences of nature that have combined to create this special scent. The bottle is clear glass emblazoned with the brand’s legendary seal, and features a silver top.
feature_bullets: It is recommended for daily use
Long lasting fragrance for all skin types
This is high quality product made of high quality material
